verbose_text: Of note, the inhibition of ERK or p38 MAPK by U0126 or SB203580, respectively, decreased the apoptosis induced by cisplatin; however, enhanced apoptotic effects were observed with the use of ERK / p38 MAPK inhibitor in combination with butein.
evidence: ERK or p38 MAPK by U0126 or SB203580, respectively, decreased the apoptosis
